General.Name: Zhejiang Jindao Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Jindao Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, and service of forklift transmissions. It also manufactures construction machinery transmissions, hydraulic transmissions, and related accessories. The company offers hydraulic transmission gearboxes, electric forklift gearboxes, mechanical transmission gearboxes, construction machinery gearboxes, main reduction and differential products, and spare parts. Zhejiang Jindao Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
